channel.title: Guthix - A New Beginning Awaits You
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YCJYPvT.png[/img][/center] [center][b]Guthix[/b] is a Rsps That wishes to bring back a server base that is not commonly used lately. That base being [b]Winterlove[/b]. Winterlove is probably one of the older Rsps bases known. Recently I have seen some people using "RiotScape" and other bases similar to [b]Winterlove[/b]. My [b]goal[/b] with this project is to make a source that is not only [b]Hostable[/b] but also a nice [b]User-Friendl[/b]y base. I paln on releasing multiple builds of this. Each time a new build comes out I will put a link to it on the project thread as well as put a thread in the Downloads section. I plan on putting a lot of time and dedication into this project. Enough with the introduction, lets get into some of the important things.[/center]
[center][b]The Team[/b][/center] [center][b]Titanium - Lead Project Developer[/b][/center]
[center][b]Features[/b][/center] [center][code]September 22, 2013: Packaging Cleaned a lot of dead code[/code][/center]
[center][b]Media[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q1uKgmg.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Thread Posts[/b][/center] [center][b]Titanium_ (moparscape) Thread poster[/b][/center] [center][b]Titanium (R-S) Thread poster[/b][/center] [center][b]Titanium (google) Thread poster[/b][/center] [center][b]Thee Titanium (RageZone) Thread poster[/b][/center]
[center][b]Credits[/b][/center] [center][b]Winterlove Creator[/b][/center] [center][b]Blake(RuneSource Creator)[/b][/center] [center][b]Graham[/b][/center] [center][b]Titanium[/b][/center]
[center]Looking forward to seeing everyone's posts on this project thread (:[/center]

item.title: Guthix - A New Beginning Awaits You
item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

[quote=“I Roll Deep, post:4, topic:531966”][quote author=Titanium_ link=topic=650759.msg4367174#msg4367174 date=1379893085]

cool to see a wL in a while. good luck!

Thanks man (:

Ps. I am also looking for 1 More developer to come and help me out.
[/quote] I have a project already, but I could why not ;)[/quote]
Do u have skype?

Read full topic

Recently I have seen some people using “RiotScape” and other bases similar to Winterlove. My goal with this project is to make a source that is not only Hostable but also a nice User-Friendly base. I paln on releasing multiple builds of this. Each time a new build comes out I will put a link to it on the project thread as well as put a thread in the Downloads section.
